title: The Best Messages to Send that’ll Make Him Smile

steps.title: You’re hotter than a jalapeno!
steps.content: You’re hotter than a jalapeno!

steps.title: I blame you for distracting me at work. Why are you always on my mind?
steps.content: I blame you for distracting me at work. Why are you always on my mind?

steps.title: You remind me of my future boyfriend, isn’t that something?
steps.content: You remind me of my future boyfriend, isn’t that something?

steps.title: I’m not a photographer, but I can picture us together.
steps.content: I’m not a photographer, but I can picture us together.

steps.title: If you were a vegetable, you’d be a cute-cumber.
steps.content: If you were a vegetable, you’d be a cute-cumber.

steps.title: Can I have your picture? I need to show Santa what I want this year 😉
steps.content: Can I have your picture? I need to show Santa what I want this year 😉

steps.title: You must be related to Google because you’re everything I’m searching for.[1] X Research source
steps.content: You must be related to Google because you’re everything I’m searching for. [1] X Research source

steps.title: I can’t espresso how much you mean to me. Coffee date?
steps.content: I can’t espresso how much you mean to me. Coffee date?

steps.title: Do you have a coach? Cause you make my heart jump 😍
steps.content: Do you have a coach? Cause you make my heart jump 😍

steps.title: If kisses were snowflakes, I’d send you a blizzard.
steps.content: If kisses were snowflakes, I’d send you a blizzard.

steps.title: Don’t trip today. I’d hate to see you fall for someone else.
steps.content: Don’t trip today. I’d hate to see you fall for someone else.

steps.title: Boy, you must be a gardener cause I love those two-lips.
steps.content: Boy, you must be a gardener cause I love those two-lips.

steps.title: It must be Fall because I’m falling for you.
steps.content: It must be Fall because I’m falling for you.

steps.title: Do you like Harry Potter? Because I adumbledore you.[2] X Research source
steps.content: Do you like Harry Potter? Because I adumbledore you. [2] X Research source

steps.title: You remind me of a pepper: hot and spicy 🔥
steps.content: You remind me of a pepper: hot and spicy 🔥

steps.title: Was that an earthquake or was it just you rocking my world?
steps.content: Was that an earthquake or was it just you rocking my world?

steps.title: Do you watch a lot of HGTV? Because you sure know how to fix my heart.
steps.content: Do you watch a lot of HGTV? Because you sure know how to fix my heart.

steps.title: You must be tired from racing through my thoughts all morning.
steps.content: You must be tired from racing through my thoughts all morning.

steps.title: I wanted to send you something nice, but the mailman told me to get out of the mailbox.
steps.content: I wanted to send you something nice, but the mailman told me to get out of the mailbox.

steps.title: Sorry, but I just dropped something—my jaw!!
steps.content: Sorry, but I just dropped something—my jaw!!

steps.title: You’re body is 65% water…and I’m mighty thirsty 😏
steps.content: You’re body is 65% water…and I’m mighty thirsty 😏

steps.title: Do you know how much a penguin weighs? Enough to break the ice! Hi there! 😊
steps.content: Do you know how much a penguin weighs? Enough to break the ice! Hi there! 😊

steps.title: I can’t decide what I want more: food or you.
steps.content: I can’t decide what I want more: food or you.

steps.title: If kissing is a love language, then we have much to talk about 😘
steps.content: If kissing is a love language, then we have much to talk about 😘

steps.title: Is your license suspended? Because you’re driving me crazy.
steps.content: Is your license suspended? Because you’re driving me crazy.

steps.title: Do you play soccer? Because you’re a keeper!
steps.content: Do you play soccer? Because you’re a keeper!

steps.title: We should go out for coffee because I like you a latte.
steps.content: We should go out for coffee because I like you a latte.

steps.title: If you were a fruit, you’d be a fineapple.
steps.content: If you were a fruit, you’d be a fineapple.

steps.title: Do you fish? Because I’m totally hooked 🤪
steps.content: Do you fish? Because I’m totally hooked 🤪

steps.title: Are you a Boy Scout? Because you have my heart in knots.
steps.content: Are you a Boy Scout? Because you have my heart in knots.

steps.title: I don’t have a library card, but can I check you out?
steps.content: I don’t have a library card, but can I check you out?

steps.title: I bet you smiled when you saw my name pop up 🙈[3] X Trustworthy Source Science Direct Online archive of peer-reviewed research on scientific, technical and medical topics Go to source
steps.content: I bet you smiled when you saw my name pop up 🙈 [3] X Trustworthy Source Science Direct Online archive of peer-reviewed research on scientific, technical and medical topics Go to source

steps.title: You’re so sweet you put Hershey’s out of business.
steps.content: You’re so sweet you put Hershey’s out of business.

steps.title: Can I call you Chapstick? Because you’re da balm!!
steps.content: Can I call you Chapstick? Because you’re da balm!!

steps.title: Have you been to the doctor? It seems like you need some Vitamin Me.
steps.content: Have you been to the doctor? It seems like you need some Vitamin Me.

steps.title: Is your name Wi-Fi? Because I’m feeling a connection 💓
steps.content: Is your name Wi-Fi? Because I’m feeling a connection 💓

steps.title: I’m learning about important dates in history. Want to be one?
steps.content: I’m learning about important dates in history. Want to be one?

steps.title: Do you have an extra heart? Mine’s been stolen.
steps.content: Do you have an extra heart? Mine’s been stolen.

steps.title: Something must be wrong with my eyes because I can’t take them off of you.
steps.content: Something must be wrong with my eyes because I can’t take them off of you.

steps.title: I’m so happy for you! You have the best girlfriend ever 🤗
steps.content: I’m so happy for you! You have the best girlfriend ever 🤗

steps.title: I hope you know CPR because you take my breath away.
steps.content: I hope you know CPR because you take my breath away.

steps.title: Do you have a name, or can I call you mine?
steps.content: Do you have a name, or can I call you mine?

steps.title: Are you a time traveler? Because I see you in my future.
steps.content: Are you a time traveler? Because I see you in my future.

steps.title: So, autocorrect saved your name as “Babe.” I swear it wasn’t me ​​🤷‍♀️
steps.content: So, autocorrect saved your name as “Babe.” I swear it wasn’t me ​​🤷‍♀️

steps.title: Are you a banana? Because I find you a-peeling!
steps.content: Are you a banana? Because I find you a-peeling!

steps.title: Are you a shooting star? Because you’ve made all my dreams come true 🥰
steps.content: Are you a shooting star? Because you’ve made all my dreams come true 🥰

steps.title: Call me a thief because I want to steal your heart.
steps.content: Call me a thief because I want to steal your heart.

steps.title: Alright. I texted you. What are your other 2 wishes?
steps.content: Alright. I texted you. What are your other 2 wishes?

steps.title: Are you a dictionary? Cause you add meaning to my life.
steps.content: Are you a dictionary? Cause you add meaning to my life.

steps.title: Guess what’s on the menu? Me-n-u 😜
steps.content: Guess what’s on the menu? Me-n-u 😜

steps.title: I must be a snowflake cause I’m falling for you.
steps.content: I must be a snowflake cause I’m falling for you.

steps.title: We’re not socks, but we’d make a great pair.
steps.content: We’re not socks, but we’d make a great pair.

steps.title: If I were a surgeon, I’d give you my heart.
steps.content: If I were a surgeon, I’d give you my heart.

steps.title: My feet are cold. Must be because you knocked my socks off.
steps.content: My feet are cold. Must be because you knocked my socks off.

steps.title: You must be a magician because the world disappears when I talk to you.[4] X Research source
steps.content: You must be a magician because the world disappears when I talk to you. [4] X Research source

steps.title: It must have been tough waiting for me all these years.
steps.content: It must have been tough waiting for me all these years.

steps.title: I really want tacos…and a cute guy to eat them with 😝
steps.content: I really want tacos…and a cute guy to eat them with 😝

steps.title: Congrats! You just won The Best Girlfriend Ever! Your prize will arrive at 6 PM 😏
steps.content: Congrats! You just won The Best Girlfriend Ever! Your prize will arrive at 6 PM 😏

steps.title: On a scale of 1 to 10, I’d say you’re my number 1.
steps.content: On a scale of 1 to 10, I’d say you’re my number 1.

steps.title: Hey! Stop thinking about me so much!
steps.content: Hey! Stop thinking about me so much!

steps.title: Are you a sheep? Because your body is unbaaalievable!
steps.content: Are you a sheep? Because your body is unbaaalievable!

steps.title: I called 911…You’re under arrest for being too cute.
steps.content: I called 911…You’re under arrest for being too cute.

steps.title: I doughnut want to glaze over the fact that I love you a hole lot.
steps.content: I doughnut want to glaze over the fact that I love you a hole lot.

steps.title: Sometimes I look at my boyfriend and go, “Wow. He’s lucky.”
steps.content: Sometimes I look at my boyfriend and go, “Wow. He’s lucky.”

steps.title: Do you like sales? Because clothing is 100% off tonight 😜
steps.content: Do you like sales? Because clothing is 100% off tonight 😜

steps.title: What do you call 2 birds in love? Tweet-hearts.
steps.content: What do you call 2 birds in love? Tweet-hearts.

steps.title: Do you believe in love at first sight or should I walk by again?
steps.content: Do you believe in love at first sight or should I walk by again?

steps.title: Are you French? Because Eiffel for you.
steps.content: Are you French? Because Eiffel for you.
